bio: Advocate Business Designer The Graph Blockchain | Growth | User Experience HCD | Web 3 I believe that technology can be a solution for reduce the economy gap.
contributionDescription: I organized an event to share how blockchain technology can be used alongside a data indexing solution like The Graph to build useful applications in a more accessible way. I explained what Optimism is, especially OPSTACK, and how it functions as a layer 2 solution that can deploy Ethereum applications more quickly and cost-effectively. I also provided concrete examples of how The Graph and Optimism could be applied together, such as to create decentralized marketplaces or DeFi apps. With the goal of bringing these technologies to more developers in Latin America, I also shared Spanish-language community channels where people can learn about and get involved in blockchain projects.
impactDescription:
Onboard web2 people to web3, First I invite people from Data Science, data analitics .
No one knows about optimism and The graph. As blockchain 
 technologies are still new in some regions, these outreach efforts help Optimism stay relevant in emerging markets like Latin America.

what information is still needed orhow Optimism could be communicated better cross-culturally. (More tangible Projects)

Leveraging Partners: Demonstrating how Optimism and The Graph complement each other showed developers synergy between protocols. Increased cooperation opens doors for more innovative multi-chain projects.
